content:
Hello!
I wonder, is it possible to disable notifications from Notification Bot about messages move to another topic?
We have integration where we automatically moving some messages to another topic, and We dont want Notification Bot to make these notifications. Its SMS gateway integration and when this notification is created (from bot) it is sent also in another message via SMS gateway..
Thanks for help!
Vojta
@Vojtech Brothanek thanks for the feedback!
You should be able to change your integration to pass this parameter to control this behavior: https://zulip.com/api/update-message#parameter-send_notification_to_new_thread
(If you have ideas for documentation improvements we could make around this behavior, they'd be appreciated!)
